asset.hookText:
Baldface Guide GORE-TEX® Pant Fabrication

•GORE-TEX® 3-Layer Laminate
•Fully Taped Seams
•Ergo Fit

Features
•Zip Tech® Jacket to Pant Interface
•Recco® Avalanche Recovery System
•Mesh Lined Zippered Vents
•Stone Butt Patch
•Triple Reinforced Rise
•Adjustable Inner Waistband
•Hand Warmer Pockets
•V-Science Boot Gusset w/ Snap
•Stretch Boot Gaiter w/Lace Hook
•Black-Flax Reinforced Back Hem
•Stone Ticket Ring
•Back Pockets
